original_text:
7s On Fire
Incontriamo nuovamente lo sviluppatore Barcrest, che dal classico layout di slot di frutta ha realizzato la divertente slot gratis 7s On Fire 3×3. Le prime impressioni giocando sono sicuramente positive. Scopri nella mia recensione tutti i dettagli!
Un gioco adatto a tutti i tipi di giocatori
La grafica ricorda i giochi dei primi anni ’80 e il gameplay risulta molto semplice. Per far girare i rulli 3 × 3, si parte da una giocata minima di 0,10€ fino a 500,00€ per giro. Le regole sono facili: devi semplicemente far atterrare 3 simboli uguali sopra le 5 linee di pagamento per realizzare una combinazione vincente. Il gioco ha un RTP del 95,10% e una volatilità molto elevata, quindi attenzione al portafoglio!
Da cosa è formata la tabella dei pagamenti in ordine crescente?

ciliegie,
arance,
BAR,
angurie,
campane,
stelle,
7 standard
7 Fire che valgono 250x la giocata e sono i Wild del gioco.

Altri tipi di scommesse disponibili
Un altro tipo di scommessa che puoi piazzare riguarda i 5 giri di High Roller. Le differenze più papabili in questa giocata risiedono sia nel pagamento delle combinazioni vincenti che qui risulta minore, sia nel comportamento del Double 7 Wild che ora è in grado di sostituire tutti gli altri tipi di simboli, non solo il singolo Lucky 7. Guardando le ricompense della slot, queste raggiungeranno solo 1.250 volte la puntata durante il gioco base e 625 volte per gli High Roller Spins.
Che idea mi sono fatta su questa slot senza scaricare?
Il gioco base devo ammettere che è abbastanza noioso e ti offre solo un semplice Double 7 Wild, che ha potenzialità molto limitate. Allo stesso tempo, questi Double 7 nei giri High Roller sono in grado di offrirti le migliori vittorie del gioco, pagando 250 volte la puntata nel gioco base e 125 volte durante i Giri Gratuiti. Se ami il tema spensierato della frutta, ti consiglio di sfogliare l’elenco dei titoli dei nostri casinò online, potresti trovare una slot fruttata più dinamica sia in modalità demo che con denaro reale come ad esempio Fruit Xtreme di Playson o Fruit Case di NetEnt recensite da me!

raw_translation.response:
7s On Fire
Once again we meet the Barcrest developer who has created the entertaining free slot 7s On Fire 3x3 from the classic fruit slot layout. The first impressions playing are definitely positive. Discover all the details in my review!

A game suitable for all types of players
The graphics are reminiscent of the games of the early '80s and the gameplay is very simple. To spin the 3x3 reels, you start with a minimum bet of €0.10 up to €500.00 per spin. The rules are easy: you simply have to land 3 identical symbols on the 5 paylines to make a winning combination. The game has an RTP of 95.10% and very high volatility, so watch out for your wallet!

What is the payout table made up of in ascending order?

cherries,
oranges,
BAR,
watermelons,
bells,
stars,
standard 7s
7s Fire that are worth 250x the bet and are the game's Wilds.

Other types of bets available
Another type of bet you can place concerns the 5 High Roller spins. The most significant differences in this bet lie in both the payout of winning combinations, which is less here, and the behavior of the Double 7 Wild, which can now replace all other types of symbols, not just the single Lucky 7. Looking at the rewards of the slot, these will only reach 1,250 times the bet during the base game and 625 times for the High Roller spins.

What idea do I have of this slot without downloading it?
I must admit that the base game is quite boring and offers you only a simple Double 7 Wild, which has very limited potential. At the same time, these Double 7s in the High Roller spins are capable of offering you the game's best wins, paying 250 times the bet in the base game and 125 times during the Free Spins. If you love the carefree fruit theme, I recommend browsing the list of titles of our online casinos, you may find a more dynamic fruity slot in demo mode or with real money such as Playson's Fruit Xtreme or NetEnt's Fruit Case, reviewed by me!

response.headline: Gameplay
response.content:
Are you ready to feel the heat? 7s On Fire is a sizzling hot 3x3 slot game featuring a classic fruit slot layout that will transport you back in time to the arcade halls of the 80s. Get ready to spin the reels and watch the fiery 7s ignite your screen.

The game is easy to play, so even if you are new to the world of online slots, you can jump in and start spinning in no time. With a minimum bet of €0.10 and a max bet of €500.00 per spin, there is something for every type of player.

', 'content': '

response.headline: Payout
response.content:
You know what they say, the only thing better than winning is winning big! And with 7s on Fire, you have the chance to do just that. The payout table is in ascending order, starting from cherries - which are always good, you know - and moving up through the ranks of oranges, BAR, watermelons...you get the idea. But don't stop at the bells or stars - keep your eyes peeled for the standard 7s and the elusive 7s Fire, which is the game's Wild symbol and worth a whopping 250x the bet. That's enough to make any gambler's heart skip a beat!

But wait, there's more! The game rewards winning combinations up to 1,250 times the bet during the base game and 625 times for the High Roller spins. So not only can you win big, but you can win even bigger if you're willing to roll with the high rollers. Just don't forget that with great risk comes great reward - or a great loss. So choose wisely, my friend!

Review:
 
Gameplay

7s On Fire is a 3x3 slot game with a classic fruit slot layout. The game rules are straightforward: spin the reels starting with a minimum bet of €0.10 up to €500.00 per spin. The objective is to land 3 identical symbols on any of the 5 paylines to make a winning combination. The game has an RTP of 95.10% and very high volatility.

Payout

The payout table is in ascending order, starting from cherries, oranges, BAR, watermelons, bells, stars, standard 7s, and 7s Fire, which is the game's Wild symbol and worth 250x the bet. The game rewards winning combinations up to 1,250 times the bet during the base game and 625 times for the High Roller spins.

Volatility

The game has very high volatility, which means that winning combinations may be scarce but worth larger payouts.

High Roller Bet

7s On Fire offers another type of bet, the 5 High Roller spins. In this mode, the Double 7 Wild can replace all other symbols, not just the single Lucky 7, and winning combinations pay out less than in the base game. Nevertheless, the High Roller spins can offer the game's best wins, paying 250 times the bet in the base game and 125 times during the Free Spins.

Alternatives

The game's base game may be considered boring by some players, but the High Roller spins offer more potential wins. If you enjoy fruit-themed slot games, you may want to try other titles like Playson's Fruit Xtreme or NetEnt's Fruit Case. These games offer more dynamic gameplay and are available in demo mode or with real money at online casinos.

cons: High volatility can lead to excessive loss

Payout and Paylines

The payout table in 7s On Fire is composed of cherries, oranges, BAR, watermelons, bells, stars, standard 7s, and 7s Fire which is the game's Wild symbol. 7s On Fire features an RTP of 95.10% and high volatility. This means that while the game offers high potential rewards, players should be cautious while betting to avoid excessive loss.
